name: Vampire Sucker
text:
2 Zombie monsters
If you would Tribute a monster(s) for a Tribute Summon, you can Tribute a Zombie monster(s) your opponent controls, even though you do not control them. You can only use each of the following effects of "Vampire Sucker" once per turn.
â—? You can target 1 monster in your opponent's GY; Special Summon it to your opponent's field in Defense Position, but it becomes a Zombie monster.
â—? If a Zombie monster(s) is Special Summoned from either GY: Draw 1 card.
